mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.tm_name, t.logo_url FROM category_trademark AS ct INNER JOIN trademark AS t ON ct.trademark_id = t.id WHERE ct.third_level_category_id = #{thirdLevelCategoryId} AND ct.is_deleted = 0 AND t.is_deleted = 0

SELECT t.id, t.tm_name, t.logo_url FROM trademark AS t LEFT JOIN category_trademark AS ct ON t.id = ct.trademark_id WHERE ( ct.third_level_category_id IS NULL OR ct.third_level_category_id != #{thirdLevelCategoryId} OR ct.third_level_category_id = #{thirdLevelCategoryId} AND ct.is_deleted = 1 ) AND t.is_deleted = 0 AND t.id NOT IN ( SELECT ct1.trademark_id FROM category_trademark AS ct1 WHERE ct1.third_level_category_id = #{thirdLevelCategoryId} AND ct1.is_deleted = 0 )
